name: Your partner has not responded
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

Your ((partner)) has not responded to your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)). They should have responded by ((date of response)).

#What you can do next
They are still able to respond, so you can contact them and remind them, if it is safe to do so. Sometimes emails from the court can go to spam. 

If you do you not think they will respond then you view your options here: ((signin url)). 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Action required: your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
